job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving existing AI systems for customer support rather than developing new AI models or applications from scratch. While it involves AI, the core tasks are about application support and fine-tuning, which doesn't align with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer as defined in the coding book. The role is more about leveraging AI tools for a specific business function (customer support) rather than building AI-centric products or core AI systems.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions' directly relates to adapting or improving existing AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'improving the AI system' implies making changes or enhancements to the AI models or their performance.
The phrase 'Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback' is part of the process of evaluating and refining AI model outputs, which is a form of model improvement.
job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies' involves exploring and evaluating new AI approaches, which can be considered part of the modeling process, especially in an applied context.
job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support' suggests combining different systems and expertise to create a functional support system, which involves software integration.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short' indicates understanding the limitations of AI in a business context and applying human judgment to solve problems.
job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve' highlights an understanding of business problems and where AI capabilities are insufficient.
job_tasks.phrase: focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
